title: Rebirth
quote: Every empire begins with a single coin.

title: Veteran of the Belt
quote: You've seen the cycle. You choose it.

title: Legend
quote: Stories spread faster than light in the colonies.

title: Ascendant
quote: The void holds no fear for those who reset.

title: Void Walker
quote: Between the stars, only the persistent remain.

title: Eternal Miner
quote: Coins come and go. The grind is forever.
